title: Onsite playground, Separate dining area, Mountain views
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '973', 'Address:', '501 E Lake Mead Pkwy', 'Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Separate dining area', 'In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', 'Onsite playground', 'State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Polished kitchen countertops', 'Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', 'Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball', 'Mountain views', 'Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
